com.risk6441.controller

Class PlayGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk6441.controller.PlayGameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class PlayGameController
extends java.util.Observable
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, java.util.Observer, java.io.Externalizable
    This class controls the behavior of main game and allow users to perform action
    • Choose Number of Players
    • Place Army
    • All Phase including Reinforcements, Fortify and Attack
    • World Domination by Player
    • Choose Cards
    Author:
    Jemish, Dolly, Deep
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
